tool_description: The most powerful sports API for live scores and football scores, results and stats. And not just football – choose from more than 20+ sports, 5000+ leagues and tournaments, millions of events and many esports competitions. Analyze almost any live score and statistics on the planet ... This API helps to create a sporting site/application
title: Divanscore

api_list.name: matches/get-all-odds
api_list.description: Get all available odds relating to a match

required_parameters.name: matchId
required_parameters.description: The id field of match returned in …/tournaments/get-featured-events or …/tournaments/get-scheduled-events or …/tournaments/get-matches or …/teams/get-matches or …/players/get-matches or …/managers/get-matches
